Limit.description: Specifies that the number of VTL devices described be limited to the specified number.

Marker.description: An opaque string that indicates the position at which to begin describing the VTL devices.

VTLDeviceARNs.description: An array of strings, where each string represents the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a VTL device.  All of the specified VTL devices must be from the same gateway. If no VTL devices are specified, the result will contain all devices on the specified gateway.
